items.title: China is not backing down from Trump's tariff war. What next?
items.description: The US-China trade war shows no signs of slowing down, leaving the world unsure of what to expect.

items.title: Clean energy's share of world's electricity reaches 40%, report says
items.description: More clean electricity was generated in 2024 but there was a rise in the amount of coal and gas burnt too.

items.title: Inquiry after Indian man filmed giving water to cheetahs
items.description: The footage shows a female cheetah and her four cubs walk up to the pan and start drinking from it.

items.title: South Sudan says US visa ban caused by mistaken nationality
items.description: The government says the man it refused entry to was Congolese, not South Sudanese as the US had said.

items.title: Menendez brothers feel 'hope' for parole after decades in jail
items.description: The pair tell TMZ they are optimistic about their latest appeals over their parents' killing in 1996.
